intro: Psychotria sarapiquensis, commonly known as the Sarapiquí Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central America, particularly Costa Rica and Panama. This plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical rainforests. The plant is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical significance due to its chemical composition.
